transArray.content: It’s the first time I checked in. The room is not big, a bit like a capsule hotel, but the design and configuration are very distinctive. Compact and practical. The selection of bathrooms is especially textured. The public area is also very fashionable. The most important advantage is the excellent location. The airport express line goes directly to Sanyuan Bridge in half an hour. Five minutes’ walk away, there are many good places to eat and drink in Fenghuanghui and Fenghuangcheng. I will pay special attention to this brand chain in the future.
